oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ultrastructural study of sporulated instars of a haplosporidian parasitizing the clam Ruditapes decussatus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chagot, Dominique
Bachere, Evelyne
Ruano, Francisco
Comps, Michel
Grizel, Henri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Haplosporidian paratizing
Ruditapes decussatus
Pathology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 1951, Vilela pointed out the presence of a haplosporidian parasitizing Ruditapes decussatus from Portuguese waters and created the species Haplosporidium tapetis. Later, a haplosporidian was found in the same species originating from the pound of Thau (France).
